scan_metadata.description: awslambda - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check VPC configuration
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function is inside a VPC

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CloudTrail logging
check_functions.description: Checks if API operations are logged in CloudTrail

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Script to scan for secrets in code
check_functions.description: Ensures no secrets are present in Lambda code

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Script to scan for secrets in environment variables
check_functions.description: Ensures no secrets are present in Lambda environment variables

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check public accessibility
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function is not publicly accessible

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CORS policy
check_functions.description: Checks CORS policy for Lambda function URL

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check public URL settings
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda function URL is public

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check runtime support
check_functions.description: Ensures Lambda function uses supported runtimes

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check multi-AZ VPC configuration
check_functions.description: Checks if Lambda VPC spans multiple availability zones
